newsitem.title: JAPAN: Miura Co to buy back 840,000 shares.
newsitem.headline: Miura Co to buy back 840,000 shares.

text.p: Miura Co Ltd said on Monday that it was planning to buy back 840,000 of its common shares in order to implement a stock option plan.
The manufacturer of industrial boilers said in a statement that it would buy the shares back at 1,500 yen per share.
It will spend up to 1.5 billion yen to buy back the shares during the August 5-25 period, it added.
